name: Hardway Party
description: Hardway Party is a fast-paced arcade game. Unlock over 50 unique cars and over a dozen worlds. Play with up to 3 of your friends in versus mode or crazy survival mode. If that's not enough, challenge anyone in online multiplayer or show off your skills in 6 differently-themed missions. Let’s get the party rollin’!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel i3 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: HD Graphics 2000 DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 800 MB available space
